snippet: A sport utility vehicle strikes a bicyclist and other vehicles on Coney Island Avenue before crashing through a barrier and plummeting roughly 40 feet into a construction pit.
abstract: A sport utility vehicle strikes a bicyclist and other vehicles on Coney Island Avenue before crashing through a barrier and plummeting roughly 40 feet into a construction pit.

headline.main: Car Plunges Into Brooklyn Construction Site After Driver Loses Control
headline.print_headline: Woman in S.U.V. Survives a 40-Foot Plunge
